name: Mission Inn Resort & Club

reviews.title: Great for Golfers but not much to do at night
reviews.text: I just came back from a business trip to the Mission Inn. The grounds were very lush and a true golfer's paradise. The room was clean and it was my understanding that the rooms went under rennovation only a few years back. My room was well stocked with towels and amenities. I liked the fact that each room had its own private balcony. Each night i received turn down service (without asking). The food was average, nothing to write home about. The staff was friendly and willing to help. Outside of the inn there really wasnt much to keep you busy at night. During the day there is a winery close by and a short drive to Mount Dora may provide some retail therapy. This is not a place to party but more of a place to unwind and take it easy. Being that it is family owned they take the time to make sure things are right.

reviews.title: Best Kept Secret
reviews.text: I have just returned from my fourth visit to the Mission Inn Resort located in Howey-in-the-Hills, Florida, about 45 minutes north of Orlando airport. For the fourth time in a row, I have had an excellent experience.

Many things make this family-owned resort special. There are two fabulous golf courses and the grounds are gorgeous and well-kept. The restaurants are wonderful and there is no need to leave the premises once you arrive. Since you are in the middle of nowhere, there isn't much reason to leave anyway.
reviews.title: Old and tired but hanging in there

reviews.text: The staff is friendly, the rooms large and clean and most rooms have a private terrace overlooking the golf course. I have attended the golf academy there three times and found the quality of instruction excellent.
reviews.title: Really a Nice Place!
Loved the Charm
reviews.text: For three of my visits, I was there with five other women. They all loved Mission Inn as much as me and we found it very female friendly.

reviews.title: Best Kept Secret
reviews.text: The Mission Inn, just 40 minutes north of Orlando, is Florida's best kept secret. This lovely resort has two wonderful golf courses, a terrific golf academy and an old fashioned low key ambiance. There is no spa, no Turkish towel in the bathroom but if you are looking for great golf, very good food and a no hassle vacation at very reasonable rates, this is the place you should try. I attended the golf academy last April with several friends and we just loved everything. The teaching pro was terrific and my handicap dropped by 7 after I returned home. After a morning of lessons, we played 18 holes of golf, took a dip in the pool, soaked in the hot tub and then ended the day with dinner...all without ever leaving the resort. The rooms were clean and nice but not fancy. Management was sometimes a bit disorganized but always extremely helpful, responsive and pleasant. The price/value relationship here is very fair.

reviews.text: The Mission Inn Resort & Club is old and shows its age. Old furniture; old carpets; old air conditioners; really old televisions.
reviews.title: Golf, golf, golf and tennis

reviews.text: Thinking we had booked a suite, we called housekeeping to request two robes for our room. We were transferred to three different people who could not make the decision to provide us with two robes. Finally, the surly Reservations Manager telephoned. She explained that only the large suites on the 4th floor qualify for robes. However, she curtly responded that we could buy two robes. When I asked the price, she did not know!
reviews.title: Great Golf Getaway

reviews.text: Who asks for robes, but seasoned travellers? What could she be thinking. It would cost $2 to launder the robes.

description: The magnificent Mission Inn is located just 35 minutes north of Orlando. The resort offers easy interstate access to world famous attractions. On property we have two championship golf courses, tennis, trap and skeet, Spa Marbella, boating and fishing, and a variety of leisure activities that guests come to enjoy! It's All Here at Mission Inn!
